column4: sonata is front-end for mpd. However, when I choose to install sonata, mpd is not considered a dependencie (it took me some time to figure out why sonata was not working). Where should I point this out so it can be corrected?

hmmm, now that you mention that, I never seen anywhere saying that it's exclusive for mpd, only that it's a front-end for mpd. But SMplayer also doesn't say that it's exclusively a front-end for mplayer and has mplayer has dependencie
the definition of sonata (in their website) is "An elegant music client for MPD"
